welcome_message_body: "Welcome to White House, the charming capital city of the United States! Get ready to experience the rich history and vibrant culture this city is known for. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that White House has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nashville International Airport serves all airlines and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Nashville International Airport primarily serves Southwest Airlines and offers a variety of dining and shopping options.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Nashville International Airport primarily serves American Airlines and Delta Air Lines and offers a variety of dining and shopping options.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
